id-17988.title: Brandstore
id-17988.post-content:
Let your brand shine with our Brandstore website template. The Brandstore template is a simple, clean, mobile-friendly design, helping customers shop from anywhere. The template is built to integrate with WooCommerce seamlessly, so you can start showcasing your products in minutes and accept online payments.

We also have a range of custom page templates for you to use as the foundation for your site and a range of beautiful preset designs we’ve created. It’s a modern design with a lot to recommend it, ideal for online stores.

Key features of the Brandstore template

  • High converting and lightweight online store template
  • Seamless integration with WooCommerce
  • Impressive hero image to display your best products and offers
  • Host of customization options from colors and typography to layout and more
  • Fully responsive and works perfectly well on mobile devices
id-17988.post-excerpt: Build the perfect online store using our high-converting Brandstore website template

id-94686.title: Agency
id-94686.post-content:
The Agency Signature template is a visionary design ideal for digital agencies of all shapes and sizes. It’s thoroughly modern, with bold typography and contrasting colors, ready to attract attention.

All pages have been thoughtfully designed to deliver all the elements a visitor looks for, with something to engage everywhere you look. The design is crisp and modern and can be fully customized using built-in tools or your favorite page builder. It’s a superb choice for any type of digital agency.

Key features of the Agency Signature template:

  • Stylish modern design inspires confidence.
  • Purposeful color-font pairing evokes an emotional response
  • Prebuilt pages to streamline setup. 
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-94686.post-excerpt: The Agency Signature template is a visionary design ideal for digital agencies of all shapes and sizes. It’s thoroughly modern, with bold typography and contrasting colors, ready to attract attention. All pages have been thoughtfully designed to deliver all the elements a visitor looks for, with something to engage everywhere you look. The design is […]

id-94191.title: Wellness Coach
id-94191.post-content:
The Wellness Coach template creates an instant calm, relaxed vibe. Cool colors, quality images and superb design helps build confidence in both you and your business.

The homepage has appointment booking front and center, supported by information on what you offer, an attractive services page and a fully operational contact page. If cool design wasn’t enough, this template has appointment booking already integrated. Just configure it to your needs and you could be accepting clients in no time!

Key features of the Wellness Coach template

  • Invigorating design ideal for the wellness niche
  • Ideal for appointment-based businesses
  • Built-in LatePoint appointment booking 
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-94191.post-excerpt: Build the perfect coaching platform using our high-converting Wellness Coach website template.

id-60434.title: Electronic Store
id-60434.post-content:
The Electronic Store template is a modern eCommerce template designed to appeal to the widest audience. The main page opens with an attractive header with search, a cart and navigation while a large hero image sets the scene nicely.

The rest of the template includes a familiar eCommerce layout with plenty of whitespace and areas to showcase your products. There are also options to add testimonials, calls to action, featured products and anything else you might need for your store.

Key features of the Electronic Store template

  • Modern eCommerce template with universal appeal
  • Engaging colors, typography and header section
  • Plenty of whitespace and areas to highlights products
  • Flexible content areas throughout the design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-60434.post-excerpt: The Electronic Store template is attractive, engaging and makes selling simple

id-69715.title: Planet Earth
id-69715.post-content:
The Planet Earth template is a multipurpose design that uses graphics to tell the story rather than images. It’s a well thought-out design that opens with a full screen illustration with engaging colors and a simple call to action.

The page opens into a business-style layout with alternating white and colored backgrounds, service boxes and calls to action within the page. There are also attractive supplementary pages and the opportunity to customize it and make it your own.

Key features of the Planet Earth template

  • Simple and effective multipurpose website template
  • Uses graphics and illustrations to great effect
  • Calm and engaging colors
  • Well-designed with excellent page balance
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69715.post-excerpt: The Planet Earth multipurpose template is a captivating design with minimalist appeal

id-72618.title: Fashion Photography Portfolio
id-72618.post-content:
The Fashion Photography Portfolio template is an elegant dark design that sets the scene immediately. It’s a grownup theme that delivers style through contrasting black and white design while offering pops of color through the images.

The template includes lots of space to showcase images and share your story to help engage. The portfolio area and dedicated page use customizable grid layouts to share and filter images and showcase your work so it looks its best.

Key features of the Fashion Photography Portfolio template

  • Dark elegant template with a grownup appeal
  • Plenty of opportunities to showcase images
  • Attractive portfolio section and page
  • Flexible content areas to communicate with your audience
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-72618.post-excerpt: The Fashion Photography Portfolio is the perfect way to showcase your creations

id-83885.title: Hope
id-83885.post-content:
Unleash the power of exceptional design with the Hope template for web designers! Crafted for creative professionals, this template ensures your website is not just a platform but a masterpiece.

The sleek and intuitive design allows you to showcase your portfolio effortlessly, creating a lasting impression on visitors. Elevate your brand with a professional-quality website that speaks volumes about your design expertise.

Key features of the Hope Template:

  • Sleek design to show your skills
  • Easy customization thanks to built-in Site Builder
  • Designed for speed and usability
  • Professional-quality template designed for the niche
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-83885.post-excerpt: Transform your online presence with our sleek web designer template!

id-73460.title: Politician
id-73460.post-content:
The Politician template is ideal for politicians, councilors, and other public figures who want to get out there, make themselves and their causes known and interact with their constituents.

The design is sober and sensible to create a feeling of trust. There’s a large hero image, ideal for making your presence known along with plenty of content blocks to tell your story and communicate with your audience. It’s a fantastic template for engagement!

Key features of the Politician template

  • Sensible design inspires confidence
  • Ideal for getting yourself out there
  • Lots of options for storytelling and sharing your vision
  • Fully responsive and customizable
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-73460.post-excerpt: The Politician template is ideal for public figures to reach out to constituents

id-73532.title: Alexandrina Kennedy – Designer
id-73532.post-content:
The Designer Link in Bio template has all the benefits of linktrees with better looks, more features, more customization options, and fully responsive designs. They are the ideal way to promote yourself online.

The Designer Link in Bio template has a feminine feel with a small slider to show off your work and links front and center to encourage engagement. All wrapped up in an appealing design that looks amazing on any screen. It’s the perfect Linktree alternative!

Key features of the Designer Link in Bio Template

  • Well-designed Designer Link in Bio Template
  • Fully responsive and works on any screen size
  • Customizable using basic tools
  • Smart slider block to help showcase your creations
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-73532.post-excerpt: Designer Link in Bio template that has all the features you need in a landing page

id-94277.title: Lifestyle Blogger
id-94277.post-content:
The Lifestyle Blogger template delivers a relaxed, reflective vibe ideal for the lifestyle and wellness niches, but could work for any type of blog. It’s modern, refined and creates the kind of welcome we all appreciate.

The homepage includes a featured posts section and different ways of accessing posts via categories or latest posts. There’s also socials, a subscription button and the features you would expect to see on a blog. Everything you see on the page is fully customizable using the block editor or Elementor too!

Key features of the Lifestyle Blogger template

  • Relaxed blog template ideal for lifestyle or wellness
  • Great structure with essential blog elements
  • Fully customizable, including layout, colors and typography
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-94277.post-excerpt: The Lifestyle Blogger template has a calm vibe that delivers an instant welcome. It’s a sophisticated design that’s deceptively simple, ideal for all kinds of blogs.

id-71669.title: Planet Earth Store
id-71669.post-content:
The Planet Earth Store template is an eCommerce store design that uses graphics and calm colors to create a buying mood. It’s light, well-balanced and provides lots of opportunities to let your products stand out.

The main page opens with a graphical banner you can use to set the scene before opening up into your product selection. Everything is customizable, everything is designed for speed and ease of use and could be used for any type of store.

Key features of the Planet Earth Store

  • Light and welcoming eCommerce store template
  • Uses graphics and calm colors to draw you in
  • Lots of options to build a profitable store
  • Works flawlessly with SureCart and WooCommerce
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-71669.post-excerpt: The Planet Earth Store template is a light store design that’s very easy to use

id-94336.title: Nexus News
id-94336.post-content:
The News Blog template is a newspaper theme ready to share lots of information in an organized way. If you run a news website, review site or like to share dynamic content, this is the template for you!

The homepage uses a logical structure with featured stories at the top, simple navigation and a logical structure throughout. It makes it easy to share lots of content without overwhelming the reader. The design is fully compatible with popular page builders so there’s no limit to what you can do with it.

Key features of the Nexus News template

  • Modern newspaper theme
  • Ideal for sharing lots of content in an organized way
  • Very flexible and infinitely customizable
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-94336.post-excerpt: The News Blog template is a clean, modern newspaper design ideal for news, reviews and content-driven websites. It’s fast, flexible and ready to share your stories.

id-93243.title: Black Friday
id-93243.post-content:
The Black Friday template uses bold design with sales-oriented touches to help your store sell more for BFCM. From the dark background to the contrast colors, it’s an excellent option for selling. It includes a countdown, sales bubble, parallax design and smart design elements to help you sell.

The template needs very little work but can be fully customized to fit your brand. With attractive store and product pages and a slideout cart feature, it’s a fantastic way to sell this Black Friday!

Key features of the Black Friday template

  • Sales-oriented Black Friday store template
  • Dark design with bold contrast colors
  • Attractive store, product and checkout pages
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-93243.post-excerpt: The Black Friday Bonanza template is perfect for businesses looking to maximize sales and attract customers during the biggest shopping event of the year.

id-94316.title: Earthly Elegance
id-94316.post-content:
The Gardening and Landscape template makes it easy to create a professional website. It’s designed specifically for gardening and landscaping, so your services look polished and inviting with minimal effort. 

Customization is simple and you can tweak it to match your brand using built-in tools even if you don’t know WordPress. The template already has built-in sections for services, projects, and testimonials, making it easy to highlight what you do and share feedback from happy clients. It’s an excellent option for gardeners, landscapers and outdoor businesses!

Key features of the Earthly Elegance template:

  • Modern, responsive design suitable for all devices​
  • User-friendly customization with intuitive interface​
  • Fast loading times for optimal performance​
  • Dedicated sections for services, projects, and testimonials​
  • SEO-friendly structure to improve search engine rankings
id-94316.post-excerpt: The Gardening and Landscape template offers a sleek design, user-friendly interface, and swift performance, perfect for showcasing your landscaping business.​

id-94350.title: Home Painting
id-94350.post-content:
The Home Painting template is designed for painting businesses that want a professional look with minimal effort. The flowing layout, bright colors and accessibility make it easy for visitors to browse services, check out past projects, and request quotes. 

The template is fully responsive and looks great on any device. It loads fast works with top page builders, so tweaking the design to match your brand is quick and easy. Whether you’re a contract painter or run a decorating business, this is the template for you!

Key features of the Home Painting template:

  • Bright, welcoming design with great colors
  • Flowing layout with essential elements for small businesses
  • Easy to customize using built-in tools
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-94350.post-excerpt: The Home Painting template is a modern design built for painting businesses, decorators or painters. It’s bright, colorful and delivers a high quality finish.
